generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a fence and some vegetation, and pedestrians are walking on it.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with visible windows and signs.
- fence: A wooden fence runs along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from a grassy area and some trees.
- pole: A traffic light pole is visible on the right side of the road, near the fence.
- traffic light: A traffic light is mounted on the pole on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign (possibly a "no entry" or "no parking" sign) is visible on the pole near the traffic light.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings, including a large tree on the right side of the image.
- terrain: A grassy area is visible behind the fence on the right side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A white car is visible driving on the road in the middle of the image.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
